author: tyler_agg
text:
imagine how powerful your AI chatbot would be if you could hook it up to your own knowledge base?

I just made a full walkthrough on how to build your own AI chatbot powered by your custom knowledge base

inside, I cover:
– how to gather and clean your docs + conversations
– chunking + embeddings (so your AI actually remembers details)
– setting up a vector database
– connecting RAG so the bot pulls the right info when asked
– deployment: getting it live for real users

reply “RAG” and I’ll DM you the walkthrough + code (must be following)
